column4: or if you are copying and pasting and there are returns it will work

are you copying and pasting from a website?
yeah
you can copy and paste it then.
it will enter it one line at a time
ok..what's the difference if it's from a website? how does it know to return after each line?
it doesn't matter where its from but if you have a list of comands seperated by returns, copy and paste will work.
ok, so the returns are indicated by semicolons?
no.
so, the return is not indicated by a chracter? am i asking one of those questions a beginner is not likely to understand?
you'd have to read about bash
ok thanks
the semicolon tells it execute each consecutively
ok
but bash is very powerfull and you really should read a howto on it.
got a link?

no I was having ubottu send you a link
